cyclone.name: ARLENE
cyclone.current_location: about 285 miles west of Ft. Myers, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving south-to-southeast away from the U.S. Gulf Coast toward the south-central Gulf of Mexico/Yucatán Channel
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: None – forecast to remain over the open Gulf and dissipate

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Portions of the east-central Gulf of Mexico, mainly well south of the U.S. coast and north of western Cuba
weather_observation.wind: None – only gentle winds expected at Mobile, AL
weather_observation.storm_surge: None – no surge impacts expected at Mobile, AL
weather_observation.rainfall: None – heavy rain focus remains over far south Florida, not Mobile, AL
